name: frieren-blog-kit
title: Frieren Blog Kit
desc: A beautifully designed Astro blog theme inspired by the beloved anime, Frieren. Perfect for fans who want a stylish, anime-themed blog with a modern touch.
article:
The Astro Frieren Blog Kit is a blog theme inspired by the anime Frieren, designed for fans who want a stylish, anime-themed blog.

Features:

  • Markdown Support: Write faster with simple, easy formatting.
  • Obsidian Integration: Draft and publish directly from your Obsidian vault.
  • Beginner-Friendly: Easy to customize, even for new coders, thanks to Astro components!

Download the Astro Frieren Blog Kit and start your anime-themed blog today!

github.name: astro-frieren-blog-kit
github.description: An Astro blog theme inspired by the anime called Frieren
